attributes.action: come to a final conclusion on catch quota and move on
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Good news that the government is bidding for bigger cod catch allowances for British fishermen next year, despite repeated scientific warnings that depleted fish cods are dangerously low. Ahead of next month's annual haggling over the national share-out of European catch allowances for 2008, Fisheries Minister Jonathan Shaw called for a fair balance between the needs of conservation and the livelihoods of hard-pressed fishing fleets. My petition is simple - we agree. Come finally to some conclusion about catch quota and get on with something more constructuve in govt.
